products.title: LG A1 55 inch Class 4K Smart OLED TV ThinQ AI® (54.6'' Diag)
products.description: G OLED TV is a joy to behold. Self-lit pixels have evolved to allow even more spectacular picture quality and a whole host of design possibilities, while the latest cutting-edge technologies help deliver unprecedented levels of wonder. This is everything you love about TV — elevated in every way.
keyFeatures: Self-lighting OLED: Perfect Black, Intense Color, Infinite Contrast
α7 Gen4 AI Processor w/ AI Picture & Sound
products.topReview: It’s hard to describe, but OLED just pops.

products.title: LG NanoCell 99 Series 2021 75 inch 8K Smart UHD TV w/ AI ThinQ® (74.5'' Diag)
products.description: Bring your favorite shows to life with bright, vivid NanoCell 8K. Full Array Dimming Pro brings you more brilliant colors, deep blacks and revolutionary backlight control. And with Nano Color Pro, you'll see natural, lifelike picture enhanced by a billion rich colors.
keyFeatures: Real 8K NanoCell Display w/ Full Array Dimming Pro
α9 Gen4 AI Processor 8K w/ AI Picture Pro & Sound Pro
products.topReview: It’s hard to describe, but OLED just pops.
